fields.name: Effect:
fields.value: Block an attack directed at you and attack your attacker for 1 HP, Unblockable.

fields.name: Upgraded:
fields.value:
Block up to 3 attacks directed at you and attack each of your attacker(s) for 1 HP, Unblockable. 

*Your attackers will be informed privately about the Retaliate?!*
